product_name: DIBS BeautyMini Double Standard Primer & Mascara Duo
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackDIBS Beauty's Mini Double Standard Primer & Mascara Duo features a brown tubing primer to lengthen and a volumizing black mascara to thicken lashes.
details: DetailsFeaturesOne wand replaces your multi-mascara stash - length, volume, or bothNatural brown and bold black - no choosing necessaryFlake-free, smudge-proof, all-day 12 HR wearActually easy to remove with warm waterInfused with shea butter, hyaluronic acid + vitamin B5 to nourish lashesFor usage on eyesSafe for sensitive eyesSafe for contact lens wearersOpthalmalogist-testedKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: Promotes stronger, longer lashesShea Butter: Known to nourish and condition lashesVitamin B5: Known to help prevent lash damage and promote growthFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesGlutenTalcItem 2642956How To UseUse the precise elastomer-bristle to swipe on the brown primer for a natural, lengthened lash. Use the bold, wavy bristle brush to go bold with the black volumizer. Or layer them up for full-on lash impact. Build to your desired drama.IngredientsPrimer: Water/Aqua/Eau, Polyurethane-35, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Stearic Acid, Synthetic Beeswax, Glycerin, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Pvp, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Palmitic Acid, Tromethamine, Coconut Alkanes, C18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Mica, Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Xanthan Gum, Disodium Edta, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499).Mascara: Water/Aqua/Eau, Acrylates/Ethylhexyl Acrylate Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Stearic Acid, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Glycerin, Pvp, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Synthetic Beeswax, Palmitic Acid, Tromethamine, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, Silica, Laureth-21, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Iron Oxides (CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use the precise elastomer-bristle to swipe on the brown primer for a natural, lengthened lash. Use the bold, wavy bristle brush to go bold with the black volumizer. Or layer them up for full-on lash impact. Build to your desired drama.

reviews.headline: I would not purchase this product again
reviews.comments: Very sticky answer alot of fall out

reviews.headline: Do not recommend-Flaky!
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this mascara because the concept is great. The primer is nice. It goes on smoothly and the brown is nice. I think the problem is the mascara and the wand. The wand is thick, and the mascara sticks to the wand which causes a clumpy application. The worst part is how flaky it is. I had flakes like I've never had with any other mascara. I wish I had waited to purchase until reviews were out. I bought way too early.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I love Dibs products and use their contour stick daily but this mascara is definitely a product i should've returned. I wanted to try it for the tubing primer but after i applied it and went about my day, it started flaking and smudging under my eyes. I also noticed it's very hard to coat the ends of your lashes with the primer brush. I find that at the end of the day the mascara is all the way off the ends of my upper lashes and looks like i wore it to sleep for the night by the end of the day.  I definitely will not buy this again as it doesn't prove to be lengthening for me, just thickening and i do not like the wear of it overtime.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again
reviews.comments: I would never buy this product again. I did not like it at all and make sure eyelashes is very clumpy. It flakes it does not make your lashes long.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: The primer is very convenient to have so you can use it before your mascara. The color combo of brown and black works really well together. I will definitely buy it again.

reviews.headline: DO NOT BUY
reviews.comments: First time I used this after only a couple hours it was flaked all over my under eyes. Thought the concept was good with the primer and mascara in the same tube but the formula is horrible!

reviews.headline: I will be repurchasing every time I run out !!!
reviews.comments: Love love love !!!

reviews.headline: Wanted to love
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this dibs mascara. I really like that it is a duo and includes primer, however I find the mascara has been clumping with every application. If the brush was better for application I feel it wouldn't clump.

reviews.headline: It's a No for me
reviews.comments: I normally use Bad Gal Bang or MacStac and with all the hype I had high hopes for this one…. The formula was super wet so it was super messy and then it was super clumpy I tried a few times and it wasn't good for the price

reviews.headline: I have found THE one.
reviews.comments: This is the best mascara I've tried in years, and I am super picky. I am blown away by how great my lashes look, even after a full day at work. Forever going to repurchase. OMG!!!

reviews.headline: I will not buy this product again
reviews.comments: I have been on the hunt for the best mascara and I so wish this was the one. I really liked the packs and the consistency made me feel like it was going to be a good one but it flakes terribly and it feels crunchy. Applying the mascara is not a smooth glide at all so if try to build it up my lashes just turns into spider legs.

reviews.headline: Flaked all over
reviews.comments: Unfortunately I fell for the hype but will be returning this. Flakes all over under eyes, doesn't last. Very disappointing

reviews.headline: amazing mascara that doesn't clump
reviews.comments: I had a great first week using this mascara! It doesn't clump (I think people who are getting that are probably using too much in one go) and lasts all day. The brown side really lengthens my lashes and is super comfortable to wear. I'm definitely a new fan after a lifetime of Lancôme!!

reviews.headline: Super easy to apply
reviews.comments:
Absolute winner of the summer for me. The brown primer is amazing on its own as a brown mascara—it gives me that soft, natural lash look on "no makeup" days. But when I layer the black mascara over it, my lashes instantly look fuller, longer, and way more lifted. Zero clumps, zero flakes, and it actually lasts all day without smudging.

The best part? It comes off super easily at night (no scrubbing or panda eyes). It honestly feels like two products in one, and I love having the option to go natural or bold with just one duo. Lash routine = upgraded.

reviews.headline: So clumpy
reviews.comments: I love the dibs stick and was so excited for the mascara but it's unusable. The product is so clumpy. You can't even see the bristles on the brush with how much "runny" mascara is on it. Very disappointing.

reviews.headline: Clumpy
reviews.comments: I did like that you had the primer and Mascara all in one, but to be honest, it did make your lashes longer and fuller, but it also was clumpy.  Tried it for a week and still it was the same results.  Did not like that it was clumpy and did not look good.

reviews.headline: It's a no for me
reviews.comments: While it looks good once applied. It flakes terribly! I only applied it to my top lashes, but it also gave me raccoon eyes. This was sooo over hyped! Will be returning.

reviews.headline: Underwhelming to say the least.
reviews.comments: No volume. No length. I added layer after layer and they looked the same. Its almost like each layer was removing what the previous layer did as opposed to adding a layer/darkening the lashes. The only positive I can add is that the primer is brown/easier to cover than white. However I honestly felt the primer was swept away by the mascara. One time use and done for me!

reviews.headline: Best mascara
reviews.comments: Stayed on all day! Gave me length and volume, did not crumble, smear or itch.

reviews.headline: Worth the hype
reviews.comments: Love this mascara.  Even the primer is great on its own.  It lengthens ans has volume.

media.headline: I will not buy this product again
media.caption: Flakey and crunchy

faceoff_positive.comments: This mascara is probably the best "new" beauty item I've tried in a while. I have long lashes, but they are light in color and are hard to see with my hooded eyelids. But with this mascara, it looks like I have extensions they are so long and lovely. The brown primer goes on so smoothly, with just one coat needed. With that alone you get incredible length and no clumping. I am typically skeptical of primers because you can't see where they have/have not applied, and there are usually some clumps. But this application is so easy (even though I was skeptical when I saw the actual applicator) and wearing the brown primer alone would be perfect for a "no makeup" look. However, if you want lashes that pop and will have people asking what you use/have done to your lashes, then all you need is one coat of the black mascara. The addition of the black mascara gives you even more length and great volume. Truly, these lashes cannot be ignored because they are so bold and beautiful. I am very picky about mascara, both in terms of the actual product and the applicator. I was really worried about the applicator for both the primer and the mascara, but these seem to really work with the product. A little goes a long way with the black mascara, so applying in one light coat at a time is the best way to get volume without any lashes sticking together. If you like to put on several coats and have a few lashes that stick, a qtip or a disposable/clean spoolie will easily separate them and give you the most stunning lashes ever. I've been super dedicated to my tubing mascara for years now, and was worried about using something that isn't tubing (the primer is, but the masara isn't). However, I was pleasantly surprised to see that I have had absolutely no flaking with this product, even after a full day of wear with temps in the mid-90s and high humidity. If you like bold lashes then this is the product for you. Having both products in one is also amazing for travel, or for generally cutting down on space. I am so glad that I was given the opportunity to try this through Gloss Angeles Confidential. I am officially a Dibs mascara girl, and this is my #1 beauty find of the year (if not longer)!!
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Lashes EVER!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: The versatility of this mascara is unmatched. You get the soft clean girl no makeup makeup aesthetic with the brown primer side, the glam with the black side, and the full beat with both combined. The brown also is a tubing formula so even better for those effortlessly chic days as it comes off easily and mess free. With the black side I definitely noticed some volumizing and fluffing of my lashes, and with both combined I got my longest most voluminous results. That being said I felt this mascara really wasn't enough for me in terms of lengthening. I have fairly long lashes naturally but I'm able to get them super long usually with one coat of mascara. However with this mascara I got almost no extra length. In fact with the brown priming side only I could hardly tell I was wearing mascara. I was able to get more voluminous thick lashes with the black and brown combined, and also the black alone, but really only a moderate amount of volume at best. Also when using the black side I would get some slight clumping with or without the priming brown side. I also noticed immediate flaking with the black on my lashes, although the flakes didn'tsmudge which was at least good. The formula also wasn't a super wet one which made it less messy but I feel also less effective. I think the concept is amazing of having one tube of mascara that does it all but I wish it provided more lengthening and a little less clumping and flaking. I think if you are looking for something for a more everyday look that's easy and convenient this will be more up your alley. I'm so grateful to have had the opportunity to test this product through Gloss Angeles Confidential!
faceoff_negative.headline: Gets the Job Done

rollup.name: Mini Double Standard Primer & Mascara Duo
